channel.title: Magic Trick Reveal on PeekBehind

item.title: Controlled Chaos: How Magicians Use Disorder to Fool You
item.description: Magicians make it look chaotic, sloppy, even out of control. But that randomness? It’s often a disguise. Here’s how ‘messy’ card tricks really work.
